entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy before morning. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Light snow beginning early in the morning and ending near noon then 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers in the afternoon. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 in the morning. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Monday 3 April 2023
